job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><u>Responsibilities</u></strong></p><ul><li>Work on a cross-functional team including Data Scientists, Product Managers, Engineers, and marketing leads across the organization.</li><li>Build scalable tools to measure transactional data trends and risk measurements. Develop algorithms and experiments to minimize merchant default risk and to forecast cash flow demand.</li><li>Create and maintain data pipelines, dashboards, and data models around our communications ecosystem. Identify and own data latency and data quality issues.</li><li>Pull data and conduct product analysis to discover and suggest new product functionality and optimize existing services and systems.</li><li>Prototyping new features and building new ideas by writing code in Python.</li><li>Implement new approaches in collaboration with software engineers in production (Python, Ruby on Rails, Golang and others).</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Requirements</u></strong></p><p><strong>Required Skills<em>:</em></strong> Python, Jupyter, Pandas</p><p><strong>Nice to have Skills:<em> </em></strong>SQL</p><p><strong>Additional Requirements</strong></p><p>This job requires the candidate to be onsite in Chicago for 1-3 months with the option to work fully remotely afterward.</p><p><br></p>
